actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who have attained age 65 a refundable tax credit for amount paid for electricity or gas under automatic fuel adjustment clauses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals age 65 and over an income tax credit for the fuel surcharges imposed by public utilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who have attained age 65 a refundable tax credit for amount paid for electricity or gas under automatic fuel adjustment clauses.
